column4: hi. got a big problem an need help! i installed puredyne with an 2.6.31-9-rt kernel. ive got an intel wifi chip 6000series. i downloaded the firmware and copied it to /lib/firmware. the driver seems to be installed but doesnt drive my wifi. what step did i forget?
This channel only supports Ubuntu. irc://irc.goto10.org/#puredyne for puredyne.
This channel only supports Ubuntu. Period.
